did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Union for Radical Political Economics and Review of radical political economics records, 1961-2013.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, minutes, printed material, financial and administrative records, scholarly papers.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, memoranda, editorial board minutes, and other records of the Union for Radical Political Economics (URPE) and of its publication, the "Review of Radical Political Economics" (RRPE).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Union for Radical Political Economics (URPE) was founded in 1968 by graduate students and faculty from the University of Michigan, Harvard University, and Radcliffe College. The organization promotes an interdisciplinary approach to political economics that considers political science, sociology, and social psychology. URPE's annual activities include a winter meeting as part of the Allied Social Science Association (ASSA) and a summer conference. URPE publishes a quarterly journal, "Review of Radical Political Economics" (RRPE), and a bi-monthly newsletter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, memoranda, editorial board minutes, and other records of the Union for Radical Political Economics (URPE) and of its publication, the "Review of Radical Political Economics" (RRPE). Other acronyms commonly used in the collection include American Economic Association (AEA), Allied Social Sciences Assocations (ASSA), Steering Committee Monthly Reports (BAG).

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to all unpublished materials not related to the screening of articles for the "Review" restricted for 15 years from the date of creation, except with permission of the author.

Access to all unpublished materials related to the screening of articles for the "Review" restricted for the lifetime of the parties involved with the correspondence except with permission of the parties involved.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Union for Radical Political Economics and Review of radical political economics records, #3791. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

processinfo.head: Note:
processinfo.p: Boxes 1 to 6 sorted separately from other materials. Boxes 7 to 15 processed in 2005.
Boxes 41 and 42 were donated in 2017 by Michael Zweig, a founding member of URPE.

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p:
Series I. Articles Submitted for Publication in RRPE
Boxes 1, 2, 5, 14, 20-23, 26, 27, 33, 34

Series II. Articles Submitted for Publication to Specific RRPE Issues
Boxes 2, 3, 15-20, 24,25

Series III. Editorial Records of RRPE
Boxes 3, 6, 14, 32

Series VI. The Review of Radical Political Economics (RRPE)
Boxes 6, 7

Series VII. Summer Conference Papers
Boxes 6, 8, 9, 41

Series IX. URPE Steering Committee
Box 11, 41

Series X. URPE Records and Miscellany
Boxes 5, 6, 10, 12-14

did.unittitle: Series I. Articles Submitted for Publication in RRPE

scopecontent.p: Includes a copy of articles submitted for publication, correspondence between the author and the editorial coordinator of that article. [Note: Folder titles consisted of the author's last name and a brief title. These have been completed wherever possible.]
